AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required by condition 7 (Construction Management Plan/Statement) of Planning permission ref 19/02204/HOU (Erection of a single storey rear extension, part garage conversion, first floor side and part rear extension, alterations to raise ridge height, rear/side pitched roof dormer extensions to facilitate loft conversion)
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Condition  7 (Construction Management Plan/Statement) of Planning permission ref 19/02204/HOU by the applicant are considered satisfactory and this conditions is hereby fully discharged.

The assessment of this application has been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information /drawings. If you carry out development based on incorrect plans you may be liable to the Council taking enforcement action against you.

Please complete the appropriate application form which can be downloaded from our website http://www.planningportal.gov.uk/planning/applications/howtoapply/permissiontypesPlease complete the full planning application form , as the site address is catagorized as a flat in our record. The submitted application form is householder.
